description:
Allows a tenant to approve a third party ATR template, from an application the tenant has installed, making it available for use by the tenant.
When installed the template is not initially active.
Activates/Deactivates a ATR template.
Activates or deactivates a portfolio model.
Activates or deactivates a third party provider template. Only active templates can be accepted by tenants.
